name: CI/CD

on:
  push:
    branches:
      - test1

jobs:
  build-and-deploy:
    runs-on: self-hosted
    steps:
      - name: Checkout Source
        uses: actions/checkout@v3

      - name: Login to AWS ECR
        id: login-ecr
        uses: aws-actions/amazon-ecr-login@v2
        with:
          registry: 058264126032.dkr.ecr.us-east-1.amazonaws.com/private-frontend
          aws-access-key-id: ${{ secrets.AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID }}
          aws-secret-access-key: ${{ secrets.AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY }}

      - name: Build, Tag, and Push Docker Image to AWS ECR
        run: |
          aws ecr get-login-password --region us-east-1 | docker login --username AWS --password-stdin 058264126032.dkr.ecr.us-east-1.amazonaws.com
          docker build -t private-frontend .
          docker tag private-frontend:latest 058264126032.dkr.ecr.us-east-1.amazonaws.com/private-frontend:latest
          docker push 058264126032.dkr.ecr.us-east-1.amazonaws.com/private-frontend:latest

      - name: Deploy to AWS ECS
        id: deploy-ecs
        uses: aws-actions/aws-ecs-deploy@v2
        with:
          cluster: frontend-cluster
          service: frontend-service-test2
          task-definition: frontend-task
          container-name: frontend-3000-tcp
          container-port: 3000
          image: 058264126032.dkr.ecr.us-east-1.amazonaws.com/private-frontend:latest
        env:
          AWS_REGION: us-east-1
          AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID: ${{ secrets.AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID }}
          AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY: ${{ secrets.AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY }}
